subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: With talk of a Nadal-Federer final in the air, Roger Federer defeated Simon Greul of Germany in straight sets. Serena Williams later routed Melinda Czink of Hungary.
snippet: With talk of a Nadal-Federer final in the air, Roger Federer defeated Simon Greul of Germany in straight sets. Serena Williams later routed Melinda Czink of Hungary.
